text: the UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson and
his partner Kerry Simmons have announced
the birth of a healthy baby boy let's
talk straight away to Norman our
assistant political editor well this is
a turn up for the books obviously we
knew she was pregnant but we didn't know
the due date was this early no I think
we were told it was too early summer so
where are we back end of April it has
come a little bit later immature baby
but we're told both Kerry Simon's and
the baby are doing well that the baby
boy was born in a London hospital
earlier this morning not much more is
known but you have to say what a
tumultuous few weeks in the life of the
Johnson household with a very obviously
Boris Johnson having a near-death
experience with coronavirus and now the
birth of a baby boy cynical old hacks
like me were assuming that well he
wouldn't be taking part in PM cues
because maybe his health wasn't quite up

better reason for not taking part in PM
cues he's got much more important things
to focus on I guess there'll be a

taking any time back from sort of
frontline of politics actually I would
probably doubt it given the gravity of

of respite from having to deal with

because of the intensity of the
situation that we are now in and I think
actually never when we first learned

only ever actually confirmed he was

course the other question is the name
what will the baby boy be called but hey

hearing that the Prime Minister and

mean hugely huge
whirring and when you're pregnant the

compounded and then compounded again by

emotional roller coaster which
fortunately seems to have you know ended
well and as I say in the sort of daily

Boris Johnson and his partner Kerry
